summary: Residents of a mansion live in fear when a young girl is murdered. They suspect their neighbor for the crime, and a battle erupts to protect the next victim.
cast: Yunjin Kim|Dong-seok Ma|Ho-jin Chun|Seong-gyoon Kim|Sae-ron Kim|Ha-ryong Lim|Jang Young-Nam|Ji-han Do|Cha Hyeon-woo|Han Soo Hyun|In-gi Jeong|Jeong-tae Kim
title: I-ut saram
